name: Escape From Solitary
description:
A first-person puzzle game which tasks the player with escaping a set of escape rooms by solving the puzzles in order to obtain the keys to unlock the rooms’ doors.

This game was created for my Master's Project.

Credits

Level Design and Coded by Adam Frank (me): https://adamfr52.wixsite.com/portfolio

Asset pack  used 1 (Spaceship Interior Environment Set by Denys Rutkovskyi): https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/spaceship-interior-enviro...

Asset pack used 2(-SciFi 'Populate' Pack- by Olivier Garrigue):https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/scifi-populate-pack#

Sounds used:

  • Correct Menu Game Android by Eponn: https://freesound.org/people/Eponn/sounds/619834/
  • negative_beeps.amv by themusicalnomad: https://freesound.org/people/themusicalnomad/sounds/253886/
  • Atmospheric Apparatus » Time Gate.flac by X3nus: https://freesound.org/people/X3nus/sounds/509837/
  • Game: Horror Genre - Sci Fi - We Are Not Alone Here (Alien Inspired) by M-Murray: https://freesound.org/people/M-Murray/sounds/592758/

Controls

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse Movement: Rotate character
  • E: Interact
  • Left Mouse Click: Press Keypad button
